settings.title: For more than a decade...
settings.description:
For more than a decade, our team has dedicated itself to refining and innovating top-tier hair extension systems tailored for at-home usage. Originating and honed within the salon environment, AquaLyna offers a user-friendly application method for stunning hair enhancement in the comfort of your own space.

Continuously at the forefront of the industry, we relentlessly strive to redefine the possibilities of hair extensions for our valued clientele.

settings.title: Two-Step Technology
settings.description:
Without the right method, even the best hair won't stand the test of time. That's why we've meticulously developed our hair extension procedure with a unique two-step approach to ensure unparalleled durability and comfort.

Our method not only locks in color but also respects the hair's cuticle, resulting in 100% full cuticle Remy hair that's stunningly vibrant and enduring.

First, our hair undergoes a 12-hour treatment in a nourishing solution, safeguarding the natural cuticle during the lifting process. Then, utilizing our exclusive 21-day color technique, which is both slower and gentler compared to conventional methods, we meticulously preserve the integrity of the hair while achieving optimal lifting and depositing.

settings.heading: Code of Ethics
settings.description:
We exclusively source healthy, untreated hair from adult donors who willingly contribute their hair. Our commitment is to never use hair from children or involuntary donors. Moreover, we only accept hair from physically and mentally healthy individuals. We take pride in fairly compensating each donor for their generous contribution.

At our organization, we deeply value the contributions of our donors and make sure to fairly compensate each one. Throughout the sourcing and processing of human hair, we prioritize providing fair compensation to all parties involved, ensuring they work in humane conditions with the highest standards of health and safety.

Our commitment to ethical practices extends to our workforce, as we strictly prohibit the employment of child laborers or involuntary workers. Every employee is treated with the utmost dignity and respect, and we maintain a discrimination-free environment in hiring and throughout their employment journey.
